HartreeParticleDSL.kernel_types package

Submodules

HartreeParticleDSL.kernel_types.kernels module

class HartreeParticleDSL.kernel_types.kernels.kernel(kernel_tree=None)

Bases: object

get_kernel_tree()

Returns the kernel tree held by this object.

Returns

The Kernel tree held by this object

Return type

ast.Module

HartreeParticleDSL.kernel_types.kernels.main_declaration(function)

Wrapper decorator for the main function (Algorithm). The function takes the main function, generates the ast and main_function_wrapper, and then calls the DSL to print the main function according to the chosen backend. This is currently output to stdout.

Returns

The main function wrapper corresponding to the given function.

Return type

HartreeParticleDSL.kernel_types.kernels.main_function_wrapper

class HartreeParticleDSL.kernel_types.kernels.main_function_wrapper(kernel_tree)

Bases: object

Main function wrapper class used by the DSL to store user-written code as an AST that can be used by backends to produce output.

Parameters

kernel_tree (ast.Module) – The AST parsed tree produced for a per-part kernel.

get_kernel_tree()

Returns the function tree held by this object.

Returns

The Function tree held by this object

Return type

ast.Module

HartreeParticleDSL.kernel_types.kernels.pairwise_interaction(function)

Wrapper decorator for pairwise kernel functions. The function takes the kernel function, and generates the AST, and then creates the pairwise kernel wrapper from that. Finally, it registers the kernel with the DSL.

Returns

The pairwise kernel wrapper corresponding to the given kernel.

Return type

HartreeParticleDSL.kernel_types.kernels.pairwise_kernel_wrapper

class HartreeParticleDSL.kernel_types.kernels.pairwise_kernel_wrapper(kernel_tree)

Bases: HartreeParticleDSL.kernel_types.kernels.kernel

Pairwise Kernel wrapper class used by the DSL to store user-written code as an AST that can be used by backends to produce output.

Parameters

kernel_tree (ast.Module) – The AST parsed tree produced for a pairwise kernel.

Returns the kernel tree held by this object.

Returns

The Kernel tree held by this object

Return type

ast.Module

HartreeParticleDSL.kernel_types.kernels.perpart_interaction(function)

Wrapper decorator for perpart kernel fucntions. The function takes the kernel function, and generates the AST, and then creates the perpart kernel wrapper from that. Finally, it registers the kernel with the DSL.

Returns

The perpart kernel wrapper corresponding to the given kernel.

Return type

HartreeParticleDSL.kernel_types.kernels.perpart_kernel_wrapper
